sentence: "By signing this bill into law, Mike DeWine has sold out Ohioans and law enforcement officers to special interest groups and extremists in the legislature,' said Walters.
author: David Aaro
title: Ohio Gov. DeWine signs bill allowing people to carry concealed firearms without a permit

sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine just signed a bill that allows people to conceal carry without a permit.
